recentDecisions.decision: Use squash merge for feature PRs
Re-tag version after merge to include actual feature code
Use RED-GREEN-REFACTOR phases with explicit phase tracking
Enforce test existence gate - block implementation until tests exist
Create separate /do-tdd command instead of --tdd flag on /do

projectPatterns: Re-tag version after merge if tag was created pre-merge
Squash merge keeps main branch history clean
Create separate command for distinct workflow instead of flags
Use deny > ask > allow precedence for security
